[align=center][img]https://cybercustom.com/uploads/images/klpbky.png[/img][/align]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=662802][img]https://i.imgur.com/i36UAgI.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=#ffffff]Official Groups Make a Return[/color][/b]
In addition to the many recent changes to Hack Forums, [b][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999ff]Omniscient[/color][/url][/b] has also decided to reinstate previously disbanded groups; [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5787273][b]Writers[/b][/url] and [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5784848][b]Mentors[/b][/url]. The newly restored groups should demonstrate an improved quality of content and experience to Hack Forums members.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=561239]iHydra[/url] has been appointed as the group leader and moderator of [b]Writers[/b]. [b][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999ff]Omniscient[/color][/url][/b] will retain sole control of [b]Mentors[/b].

[b][color=#ffffff]Hack Forums Mobile Beta[/color][/b]
Cell phone users rejoice! [b][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999ff]Omniscient[/color][/url][/b] has announced a working mobile theme for Hack Forums users. Current members are encouraged to test the site out on their devices and report any bugs or feedback with the theme on [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5782785]this[/url] thread. A date for official release has yet to be provided; however, updates with the project can be found [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5782785]here[/url].

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=525019][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v3/UserNews.png[/img][/url][/align]

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5787273][color=#FFFFFF]HF Writers Group[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3322334][img]https://i.imgur.com/H5MRIbN.png[/img][/url][/align]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=medium]

[b][color=white]Meteorites Containing Essentials for Life Crash to Earth[/color][/b] 
Scientists have recently come to terms with the discoveries they have made in relation to two meteorites that crash-landed on Earth's surface in 1998, otherwise dubbed as Monahans and Zag. Extensive analysis of blue and purple salt and potassium crystals from the meteorites led the research to a conclusion so optimistic, that even research scientists are baffled till this day: the meteorites contained the "ingredients" that were essential for life. To be specific, these ingredients were liquid water, amino acids, hydrocarbons and other organic matter. They also believed these materials weren't always found in normal meteorites, theorizing that it could have come from volcanic activity on a distant planet, although occurrences like this are not foreign to Earth. While the researchers aren't attempting to use this discovery to prove life on other planets, it is certainly something to give a thought about in future discussions about life on a different planet. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.cnn.com/2018/01/11/world/meteorites-organic-matter-life/index.html]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Scientists Discover Stem Cells Responsible for a Fly's Nervous System[/color][/b] 
Another groundbreaking development was made in humankind's never-ending quest to understand and fully make use of stem cells in curing the ills that plague our planet till this day. Researchers from Columbia's Mortimer B. Zuckerman Mind Brain Behavior Institute have unearthed new information regarding these elusive cells by observing the insects that everyone loathes and swats away on a daily basis: flies. According to the published report, the stem cells of a fly are by far the easiest to manipulate. While observing these cells, the researchers noticed a part of one stem cell breaking off of its current task and beginning to form a glial cell, which represent the cells that make up the nervous system. To sum up the ultimate purpose of this research, the Higgins Professor of Biochemistry and Molecular Biophysics at Columbia University Irving Medical Center, Dr. Mann, said "If you want to try to harness the potential of stem cells to treat disease or to recover from an injury, It's important to know what the behavior of these stem cells is in an animal during normal development."  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.sciencedaily.com/releases/2018/01/180125135604.htm]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]First Monkeys Cloned With DNA Transfer Come to Life in China[/color][/b] 
Using the same process that brought the first cloned mammal from a somatic cell, researchers in China have replicated the exact groundbreaking cloning process with two long-tailed macaques. The two monkeys, named Zhong Zhong and Hua Hua, were not the first results produced by this experiment. The successful cloning required certain modifications in its procedures that deviated from the original procedure involved. The researchers claim that this research will be invaluable in further understanding diseases that occur on a genetic level. To those of you worried about this research being used to clone human beings one day, I would not get up in arms just yet. According to the article, this method was purportedly not sophisticated enough to come close to cloning an actual living human being. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.bbc.com/news/health-42809445]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

   
[/size][/font]
[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/pnhnIu1.png[/img][/align]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=medium]

[b][color=white]Russia Accuses U.S. of Election Meddling[/color][/b]
On early Monday morning, USNews.com, amongst others, have released articles in which Russia has accused the United States of meddling with the upcoming presidential election in Russia. In a direct quote stated by a Kremlin spokesperson, he states, ‘We do think that this is a direct and obvious attempt to time some sort of action to coincide with our elections in order to influence them,’ “Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov told journalists on a telephone conference call Monday.” ‘We disagree with this, and we are sure this will have no influence.’ This situation will seem to do nothing but only add fuel to the fire that is the accusation of Russia’s interference with the 2016 United States presidential election. To fight against the opposition, hundreds of Russian citizens gathered to march in protest, though most were shortly arrested.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.usnews.com/news/world/articles/2018-01-29/russia-accuses-us-of-election-meddling-with-anticipated-sanctions]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Fitness App’s Data Dump Accidentally Reveals Military Bases[/color][/b]
Strava, one of the world’s most popular smartphone apps, accidentally released a data dump that “revealed sensitive locations, including US military bases around the world.” The dump was released in November of last year in the form of a heatmap. Not until recently have researchers discovered that the “’anonymized’ data dump” possessed such material. In this dump, an overage of “1 billion activities, including 13 trillion GPS datapoints” were recorded and provided. The dump potentially includes additional logs of “sensitive US military sites in Afghanistan and Syria, along with sensitive Russian military sites in Ukraine, and a secret missile site in Taiwan. Being that the supply of American-based products such as Fitbits and other trackable technology as such, it is to be believed that the movement being tracked was that of US troops. Nathan Ruser, who is an Australian analyst for the UCA, “was one of the first people to point out the vulnerability of Strava’s data dump on Twitter. But he almost certainly wasn’t the first person to make use of the data.”[i][size=x-small][url=https://gizmodo.com/fitness-apps-anonymized-data-dump-accidentally-reveals-1822506098]  >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]SpaceX to launch Falcon Heavy[/color][/b]
On February 6, 2018, Falcon Heavy, created by Elon Musk’s ‘SpaceX’ team, is said to have its first launch. Per numerous sources, Falcon Heavy is the world’s most powerful rocket, and you have the weight of it to attribute that to. SpaceX, who has been funded by large companies such as Google and Fidelity, say that Heavy Falcon will have the capability to send humans to Mars, though that will not be its purpose. Its purpose serves to send satellites and other equipment into orbit, differentiating from the normal use of a high-powered rocket. Falcon Heavy consists of three stages: the first stage consists of the boosters, a liquid oxygen tank, and 27 Merlin engines, that produce 5.13 million pounds of thrust during liftoff; the second stage, which “delivers the rocket’s payload to orbit,” can sustain numerous instances of orbit, by the restarting of its engine; and the final stage, the ‘payload,’ that holds the rocket’s cargo.  [i][size=x-small][url=http://money.cnn.com/2018/01/27/technology/future/spacex-falcon-heavy-everything-you-need-to-know/index.html]>>Source[/url][/size][/i][i][size=x-small][url=http://www.spacex.com/falcon-heavy] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

    
[/size][/font]
[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/oE7fBvj.png[/img][/align]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=medium]

[b][color=white]Record-breaking 512GB MicroSD memory card announced[/color][/b]
A British manufacturer of memory storage devices recently announced the world's first 512GB MicroSD memory card, beating the record previously set by Sandisk's Ultra 400GB MicroSD memory card with 100 MB/s data speed transfer. At a whole new level of storage, this memory card can provide an ample amount of storage towards users who frequently take a lot of pictures and videos, or download a vast amount of data onto their phone on a daily or weekly basis. This includes storing HD and UHD videos and playing them seamlessly without any significant losses. The developer of the MicroSD card, Integral Memory, claimed that the MicroSD card can provide data speed transfers up to 80 MB/s. The memory card is due to be released first in the United Kingdom in February. The pricing and global availability have yet to be released by the British manufacturer. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gadgetsnow.com/tech-news/integral-memory-presents-microsd-memory-card-with-record-breaking-512gb-capacity/articleshow/62636145.cms]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Samsung Galaxy S9 announced, hints at a whole new camera[/color][/b]
Just recently, Samsung has sent out invitations towards organizations and individuals in anticipation of announcing its next flagship smartphone at the next Mobile World Congress in Barcelona, Spain on Feb. 25. Known as the Galaxy S9, the phone was officially hinted by Samsung to have a "reimagined" camera that will set the flagship phone at a different level from its competitors. According to a short speculation by editor Ron Amadeo of well-known technology publication website Ars Technica, the phone would most probably feature a variable aperture camera that was recently featured in Samsung's $1500+ (speculated price) W2018 extravagant dual-screen flip phone. The special camera would be able to adjust itself and use different camera lenses according to different environmental settings, i.e., day or night. Besides the Galaxy S9, Samsung also hinted towards presenting the 'next generation of Samsung devices.' This could refer to a few more products besides the Galaxy S9 being showcased at the world's largest mobile exhibition center. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.lowyat.net/2018/153387/samsung-galaxy-s9-25-feb/]>>Source 1[/url][/size][/i] [i][size=x-small][url=https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2018/01/samsung-announces-the-galaxy-s9-launch-teases-reimagined-camera/]>>Source 2[/url][/size][/i] [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.engadget.com/2017/12/01/samsung-w2018-flip-phone-variable-aperture-china/]>>Source 3[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Google I/O is Coming to Town[/color][/b]
Arguably recognized as the world's largest and most well-known developer conference, Google I/O's event details were released by Google in the form of a series of cryptic puzzles for users to solve and reap the reward for themselves: the venue location and opening date. As a yearly conference, Google I/O is geared towards gathering a large number of developers from around the world in showcasing a number of technical in-depth sessions that are focused on building web, mobile, and enterprise applications on Google's platforms. Last year's Google I/O saw the much-anticipated release of Android 8.0 Oreo (which was released mainly on its Nexus devices), along with other innovations like Google Assistant, Google Photos, and Daydream standalone headsets. in this year's Google I/O conference, there could be a possibility that a new Android version would be introduced or hinted upon. Besides that, most technology aficionados are expecting Google to release an update or future plan on its virtual personal assistant Google Assistant, which was gaining traction for its useful (and corny) features compared to other mobile assistants in the mobile phone market. Nevertheless, do stay updated on the happenings around Google I/O. There could be a "next big thing" introduced at this year's conference! [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gadgetsnow.com/tech-news/google-i/o-2018-heres-when-and-where-its-happening/articleshow/62637409.cms]>>Source 1[/url][/size][/i] [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theverge.com/2018/1/24/16927094/google-io-2018-dates-schedule-announced]>>Source 2[/url][/size][/i]

      
[/size][/font]
[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v3/GamingNews/Tsundere.png[/img][/align]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=medium]
[b][color=white]PUBG Recent Update[/color][/b] 
A recent patch was sent out for PUBG players to update their game with. Included in the patch was a few things that could hopefully be performance healthy for your computer. To further explain it better would be to say that your frames will not be dropping as much as they did in the previous patches. After searching for a matchmaking game, you are placed on an island with all players that are joining. Sort of like a pre-game lobby. From there, you can run around, unmute voice chat and hear the enormous amount of people screaming weird and possibly vulgar words, or you can just punch people in the genitals if you wish. One of these performance healthy changes was removing not really removing the island, but spawning players joining to be spawned elsewhere. For example, instead of the island, you will be spawned in the ruins so that all 90+ players are not in one space. In addition, there are no more guns that you can use or find. This is to also reduce the fps drops. Those working on the game say that all these characters spawning on that cluttered island would cause many performance issues for people. In a future update, PUBG developers say that a change in the plane performance will be done too. Lastly, not related to the recent changes, but over 1-million players have been banned in a huge wave. At the moment an anti-cheat system is in development to make the game as fun and enjoyable for everyone. When the time comes to implement these changes, you will be able to test them out using the PUBG Test Server client. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.pcgamer.com/pubg-removes-weapons-from-starting-island-spreads-spawn-areas-in-bid-to-boost-server-performance/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]All About Dragon Ball FighterZ[/color][/b] 
Those excited for the upcoming fighting game already know a little bit of this information. However, for those who do not, this will be a treat. Are you a fan of the Dragon Ball series? Do you like fighting games like Capcom vs. Marvel? Good news for you as a new installment in the Dragon Ball video game series will be released this Jan. 26. A beta was released for the game so if you missed it, sorry but that was your only chance. However, by the time you are reading this, the game should have been released already. The game will be available for the PS4, PC, and the Xbox One. In the official release version of the game, you are able to use 24 characters. If you think that is too little then you can also invest in the season pass which gives you 8 extra characters. This season pass will be available soon after the launch of the game. For those who are into the singleplayer mode, prepare yourselves to have a blast! The story mode takes place a little bit after the Dragon Ball Z series and during past events from the Dragon Ball Super anime. If you are an anime fan then you cannot pass up the ability to use the Japanese voice acting in the game. Yep, you heard that right! If you prefer the Japanese voices, you can turn off English and switch on the Japanese with English subtitles. Finally, if you are a huge fan of the anime and the game series, you have the option to pay even more and get the "CollectorZ" edition that comes with the game and a seven-inch Goku statue! Now is that not fancy, or what? [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/dragon-ball-fighterz-reviews-release-date-guides-a/1100-6456214/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]H1Z1 Adds New Map in Latest Update[/color][/b] 
Battle-Royal games have been becoming more and more popular. Among the most notable are H1Z1, PUBG, and Fortnite. Most recently, each game has had a set of updates or announcements for fans of their games. PUBG had an update with their starting zone, Fornite was recently released in Korea, and now weapon balances have been put into place for H1Z1. Not only that, but the biggest change for H1Z1 was the introduction of the Combat Zone. What this game mode allows you to do is test your skills and practice. You might be wondering, "But I can already do that in an actual match?!" That is true, however, what makes this different is what happens in the game mode that is different to regular matchmaking. When you start up a Combat Zone game, you instantly spawn on the ground with a bunch of random gear and a random weapon. From there, you will play the game like you normally do and look for loot to pick up. If you are then satisfied with what you have or are in search for more gear, you can travel the map and go to other places. Other players will be spawning in too, so you are not alone in this game mode. Just like you, they are spawned in a random area, have random gear, and are given a random weapon. Now, if you encounter a player your goal is just like in a normal game: kill that person. If for whatever reason you die, you will respawn in the game and will be allowed to start over. Thus allowing you to practice and practice without having to quit and restart matches. Now going back to what was originally said with the weapon balances. The assault rifles in the game have been given a recoil increase. In addition, a change to the AK was made where the fire rate was lowered. Shotgun damage is increased when up close and the most-effective pellet is the middle one. Changes to the gas now make it so that the very first time it closes is super fast. In addition to that change in the pace of the gas, the opacity (in other terms something opaque) has been reduced so that you can see inside the gas more clearly in the beginning of the game, but during the later game, the opacity will become thicker. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.pcgamer.com/h1z1-adds-new-map-and-daily-challenges-in-latest-update/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]
[/size][/font]
